title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements for the AnonymousFeedbackEngine platform.

title: System Architecture Design for AnonymousFeedbackEngine
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, security considerations, scalability, and performance optimizations. Ensure proper separation of concerns, modular design, and adherence to best practices. Consider incorporating microservices architecture for better scalability and maintainability. Implement robust authentication and authorization mechanisms, ensuring two-factor authentication where possible. Ensure data anonymization and encryption at rest and in transit using industry standard algorithms. Design for high availability and fault tolerance with load balancing and automatic failover mechanisms. Incorporate monitoring, logging, and auditing for better observability, troubleshooting, and regulatory compliance. Consider integrating with existing enterprise systems or third-party services for enhanced functionality or data enrichment, while ensuring proper API security. Upon completion of the design, provide detailed documentation for developers to follow during implementation. Include clear descriptions of each microservice's responsibilities, as well as guidelines for communication between them. Additionally, outline strategies for managing and scaling the databases used in this system. Consider the long-term maintenance and scalability of the architecture, and factor in future improvements or expansions. Upon review, update the rfc_state field to 'REVIEWED' if ready for further discussion or 'NEEDS_MORE_INFO' if additional information is required.

title: Database Design for AnonymousFeedbackEngine
description: Design the database schema and data models for storing feedback data, user information, and related entities. Ensure data privacy, security, scalability requirements are met by implementing necessary encryptions and anonymization techniques. Collaborate with Security Specialist to ensure data protection standards are met. This task involves considering the implications of feedback analysis algorithms on the overall system design. For the database design, focus on normalizing the data for efficient querying, consider using a combination of relational and NoSQL databases to optimize performance, and ensure that the design allows for future growth and scalability.
